sqlMap.select: select SC_PRODUCT_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PROD_CODE, PROD_NAME, PROD_DESC, STATE from SC_PRODUCT where SC_PRODUCT_ID = #scProductId:DECIMAL#

select distinct sp.SC_PRODUCT_ID, sp.SC_ORG_ID, sp.PROD_CODE, sp2.PROD_NAME, sp.PROD_DESC, sp.STATE from SC_PRODUCT sp left join SC_PRODUCT_I18N sp2 on sp.SC_PRODUCT_ID = sp2.SC_PRODUCT_ID and sp2.LANG_FLAG=#locale:VARCHAR#,CC_CUST_PROD ccp where sp.sc_product_id=ccp.sc_product_id and sp.SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL# and sp.STATE=1
ccp.CC_CUST_ID in
#custId[]#
order by sp.sc_product_id asc

select sp.SC_PRODUCT_ID, sp.SC_ORG_ID, sp.PROD_CODE, sp.PROD_NAME, sp.PROD_DESC, sp.STATE,i18n1.PROD_NAME PROD_NAME_ZH,i18n2.PROD_NAME PROD_NAME_EN, i18n1.PROD_DESC PROD_DESC_ZH,i18n2.PROD_DESC PROD_DESC_EN from SC_PRODUCT sp left join SC_PRODUCT_I18N i18n1 on sp.SC_PRODUCT_ID = i18n1.SC_PRODUCT_ID and i18n1.LANG_FLAG='zh_CN' left join SC_PRODUCT_I18N i18n2 on sp.SC_PRODUCT_ID = i18n2.SC_PRODUCT_ID and i18n2.LANG_FLAG='en_US' where sp.SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL# order by sp.sc_product_id desc
sqlMap.insert:
select SC_PRODUCT$$SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into SC_PRODUCT (SC_PRODUCT_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PROD_CODE, PROD_NAME, PROD_DESC, STATE) values (#scProductId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, #prodCode:VARCHAR#, #prodName:VARCHAR#, #prodDesc:VARCHAR#, #state:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update SC_PRODUCT set SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, PROD_CODE = #prodCode:VARCHAR#, PROD_NAME = #prodName:VARCHAR#, PROD_DESC = #prodDesc:VARCHAR#, STATE = #state:DECIMAL# where SC_PRODUCT_ID = #scProductId:DECIMAL#

update SC_PRODUCT
SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#
PROD_CODE = #prodCode:VARCHAR#
PROD_NAME = #prodName:VARCHAR#
PROD_DESC = #prodDesc:VARCHAR#
STATE = #state:DECIMAL#
where SC_PRODUCT_ID = #scProductId:DECIMAL#
